__TOC__


Here we have a sampling of bugs to work on for Hug Day.  After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after "background-color:" and before ";".  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.  

You might find it more convenient to edit the wiki page using <code>editmoin</code> a command line utility for editing moinmoin wiki pages.  It is available as a package in Gutsy and Hardy.  More information including an easier way to do this was <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-bugsquad/2007-November/000666.html|mailed]]</nowiki> to the Bug Squad. 

=== 5-a-day-ing ===

During hug days you can also do <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki> for this one you can do the following in order to tag your work on the hug day:
 
* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-20080617
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual 
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-20080617

More information about <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day#Tag|tags here]]</nowiki>.

=== 100 bugs with a New status ===
These are untriaged bug reports regarding Open Office.  You can find more <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/openoffice.org/+bugs?search=Search&field.status=New|in Launchpad]]</nowiki>.

'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
* Tag the bug with the Open Office component involved - 'ooo-calc', 'ooo-writer', 'ooo-impress', 'ooo-draw' or 'ooo-base' '''and'''
** Ask for more details (possibly the version of Open Office 'apt-cache policy openoffice.org' affected or detailed steps to reproduce), change the bug's status to "Incomplete" and subscribe yourself '''or'''
** Recreate the bug (in Hardy), document the test case in the description, and change the bug's status to "Confirmed" 
* If you have reproduced the bug and feel it is worthy of a <nowiki>[[StableReleaseUpdates| Stable Release Update]]</nowiki> please notify an Ubuntu Bug Control member or if there is not one available set the background-color to red.

=== 28 bugs with a Confirmed status ===
These bug reports have been reported about openoffice.org and are in the Confirmed state.  The list of bugs may contain ones that were confirmed by someone who doesn't have the ability to set a bug to Triaged or the Confirmed state may not have existed when they were confirmed.  If the bug still exists and has sufficient debugging information they should move to the Triaged state.

'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
